<nowiki>[[http://moodle.org/|Moodle]]</nowiki> is a complete online learning system (or Learning Management System, LMS). It is one of the most widely used servers for online curricula.

=== Installation ===

* See the <nowiki>[[http://docs.moodle.org/en/Step-by-step_Installation_Guide_for_Ubuntu|Moodle]]</nowiki> installation instructions for Ubuntu.

=== Integration with other servers ===

A functional <nowiki>[[http://www.dualcode.com/bigbluebutton/index.htm|plugin for BigBlueButton]]</nowiki> teleconferencing exists. (Also see the <nowiki>[[http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=144776&parent=632387|Moodle help page]]</nowiki> for this module.)

=== Other resources ===
